Class HtmlFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • HtmlFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HtmlComponent

    public class HtmlFragment
extends java.lang.Object
implements HtmlComponent
    A single element of HTML to be rendered by a TextWindow, containing text, font and color. In general, do not create these directly; a HtmlPrinter will create and render them.
    Since:
    October 21st, 2016
    Author:
    Ofek Gila, Saagar Jha

      There shouldn't be any reason to append to this fragment, just add a new HtmlFragment instead.

      Gets how high below the text is offset.
